text: The discography of Yoav, a singer-songwriter of Israeli-Romanian descent, raised in South Africa, consists of four studio albums and four singles. == Albums == === Studio albums === ==== Charmed and Strange (2008) ==== # "Adore Adore" – 5:36 # "Club Thing" – 4:24 # "Live" – 4:10 # "One by One" – 3:47 # "There Is Nobody" – 3:56 # "Wake Up" – 3:21 # "Beautiful Lie" – 5:10 # "Angel and the Animal" – 5:06 # "Sometimes..." – 4:49 # "Yeah, the End" – 3:27 # "Where Is My Mind?" – 3:25 (Pixies cover) # "Wasteland Waltz" (UK bonus track) ==== A Foolproof Escape Plan (2010) ==== # "Greed" – 4:36 # "Moonbike" – 3:41 # "Safety in Numbers" – 3:38 # "Yellowbrite Smile" – 3:49 # "Spidersong" – 4:00 # "Little Black Box" – 3:52 # "Easy Chair" – 5:03 # "Anonymous" – 4:15 # "6/8 Dream" – 3:53 # "We All Are Dancing" – 4:06 # "Ghost Dance" – 4:14 (UK bonus track) ==== Blood Vine (2012) ==== # "To the Woods" – 0:41 # "Know More" – 3:53 # "Karaoke Superstar" – 3:07 # "Blink" – 4:46 # "Keep Calm Carry On" – 4:40 # "Everything Is..." – 1:48 # "Pale Imitation" – 3:43 # "Hotel Oblivion" – 3:57 # "Sign of Life" – 5:08 # "Shiver #7" – 3:49 # "Malice in the Garden" – 3:30 ==== Multiverse (2018) ==== # "Blood Moon" – 4:05 # "Want More Do You Want More" – 4:04 # "Lost heads" – 4:53 # "Touch" – 4:16 # "Everything She Said" – 4:52 # "One Nature" – 4:45 # "Initiate Sequence" – 3:33 # "Mesmerize" – 5:19 # "Future Story" – 6:17 # "Reunion" – 6:24 === Soundtracks === ==== Sucker Punch (2011+ ==== 7. "Where Is My Mind?" (feat. Emily Browning) ==Singles== * "Club Thing" (2008) – No. 18 DKTop40-charts.com * "Beautiful Lie" (2008) * "There Is Nobody" (featuring Ariane Moffatt) [Live in Montreal] (2008) * "Adore Adore" (2008) * "Yellowbrite Smile" (2010) * "Blink" (2012) * "Dopamine" (2014) * "Blood Moon" (2018) * "Touch" (2018) ==References== Category:Discographies of Israeli artists
